content:
About Zachari A society grows great when old men plant trees whose shade they know they shall never sit.
A quote that I’ve had stashed away in my journal that has really stuck with me throughout the years.
I’ve had business ideas, I’ve committed to them and I have failed a few times but I have also had plenty of success.
From experience I know a lot of other founders out there come across their fair-share of struggles or critical turning points. This lead to an idea.
I wanted to share value, so instead of just writing about my experiences there could be insights, strategy and stories from founders.
So with that being said, I will now plant a seed of value, nurture until the next founder and together, we’ll grow a forest of knowledge.
summary: A society grows great when old men plant trees whose shade they know they shall never sit.
title: About
